duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide telephone support for troubleshooting software and hardware issues for end users
Perform daily administration of the LAN and WAN including system stability, integrity, and troubleshooting
Implement new client setups requiring some travel (10% travel time)
Perform hardware and software upgrades for users, including operating systems and applications
Identify and fix network devices in response to security threats
Plan and execute software and hardware upgrade planning, including desktop rollouts
Complete assigned projects and daily reporting

education_certification.credential: Minimum 3 years workstation support experience with Windows based products
